# request(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells a publisher that it may send more values to the subscriber.

## Declaration

```swift
func request(_ demand: Subscribers.Demand)
```

## Requesting elements

- **Subscribers.Demand**: A requested number of items, sent to a publisher from a subscriber through the subscription.

items.description: A requested number of items, sent to a publisher from a subscriber through the subscription.
items.name: Subscribers.Demand
